column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: The body of a 37 year old man named Ly Leap was discovered on train tracks in Porsenchey this morning.------Sources say that the man had been drinking with his brother-in-law the previous night and had left to go home.------Images show the man was decapitated by a train on the tracks. It is not clear if this was suicide or an accident. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/465060
